title: Divinity Original Sin (Latest With 1.0.57 Patch) (GOG)
description:
Hey guys, here the gog version of "Divinity: original sin" All bonus content is here like the level editor. The dlc is not included in this torrent. I will have that for you in a future update. Hope you guys enjoy and please help seed. Also once you download the torrent, please come back and leave a comment letting others users know that this torrent is 100% clean and that it working. Thxs.


---------------

What's cool about it:

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Experience gripping party- and turn-based combat. Manipulate the environment and use skill & spell combos to overcome your many foes: Use magic to make it rain on your enemies, then cast a lightning spell to fry them to a crisp.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Experiment with different skill combinations to ruin the day for enemies and townspeople alike.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Play with a friend in co-op multiplayer. Make decisions together (or disagree entirely), as your interactions and relationship with your partner influence the game.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Unravel a deep and epic story, set in the early days of the Divinity universe. No prior experience with other Divinity games is necessary, however. The game takes place well before its predecessors, Divine Divinity and Divinity II: The Dragon

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Classless character creation lets you design the character of your choice. 

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Endless item interaction and combinations take exploration and experimentation to another level of freedom.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Create your own adventures and share them online. With Original Sin comes the powerful toolset used by the game's designers. Yours are endless new stories to make and share with other players!
